channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: A wonderfully told amazing story. https://t.co/T3BKMrXGwe
@rabbijilljacobs @roripn @JewishStandard A metziah!
@DougJBalloon @Atrios Hey! He picked it up quicker than Pelosi or Schumer or Biden or Gottheimer.
@jewonthis I guess that means you don’t have to? Nice, if true.
Tell me you don’t understand what Republicans think about government without… https://t.co/F4NGk9XnOG
@jnack @ivanski Skin tones seem rather yellow. I bet Kodak would have corrected that in processing back in olden times.
@roripn @JewishStandard So will you propose a NJCRC resolution? https://t.co/hQuvgIw1mv
@roripn I propose we compromise with @JewishStandard Time — just like Standard Time, but running half an hour late.
@swordsjew The Orwell essay, which I skimmed last night, said this passage is autobiographical.

@SeforimChatter I loved her book on the topic. Is there a link to whatever this event tomorrow is?
@SeforimChatter The fun thing about the Pursuit of Heresy s that the pursuer alleged heretic was the Ramchal. Who was far more interesting than his Feldheim back cover bio let on. https://t.co/pcfeZYjUWc
@EricHolthaus @swordsjew Those of our grandchildren who make it through will build elegant memorials to victims of the climate genocide. https://t.co/7yqVsjH6w6
@onthemainline I think any reading that goes against the Levush can be considered nudist.
@roripn @YehudaKurtzer I can’t see this as anything as a major failure from the nascent Congressional Torah Caucus.
@jakebackpack Choose your Barbara Tuchman adventure.
@datadivajf Oy! Refuah shleimah! Gravity does have its downsides.
@swordsjew Good thing Democrats don’t want to make politics of repeated Republican pro-covid policies.
@AugustJPollak One has to assume they are stupider than Manchin, or Manchin is being managed by someone smarter.
@MADemocracy @JakeSherman To the daily silence of the frightened Democrats.
@JodiRibar @KathySison4 @JakeSherman Shane on the Democrats for not calling them out on it every damn day.
@AvBronstein Where’s the Torah Caucus when you need them? Zmanim are d’oraita, right?
@DBashIdeas Serves them right for dropping out of kolel.
@Atrios I think we should address the latitudinal injustices posed by axial tilt. It at least by us all winter homes in the Southern Hemisphere.
@trekonomics Wow. You’re commuting now!
Why yes, there’s Russian money behind Florida׳s pro-covid Governor. Just as there was behind our recent pro-covid president. https://t.co/zosaQZXvyM
